title: Developer - Hive 15 (Internship)
description:
We are looking for two Developers to join our Hive student lab team. The goal is to build a multidisciplinary team that includes a UX Designer, two Developers, Digital Product Designers, a Business Designer, and a Service Designer.

**What is the Hive project about?**


We don't know yet! All we know is that the Hive team will be responsible for driving a user-centered design process to explore a defined opportunity space together with a partner company and develop a digital service.

  

The process usually follows Humblebee's way of working:

* Starting with rapid field research to understand the user's needs and pains, which hopefully opens a gap in the market where we can develop a digital service.
* Then using an array of user journey creation tools and ideation techniques we build prioritized prototypes that are visually ready for testing.
* To validate our prototypes as effectively and quickly as possible we test on real users and make sure we get the most valuable feedback possible.
* Based upon our user testings & findings we can pivot and iterate our prototype accordingly.
* Simultaneously with our prototyping process, we start designing a business model to make sure the idea has concrete financial foundations.
* The Hive project should end up not with a minimum viable product (MVP) but a minimum delightful product. We ensure our MVP’s are MDP’s. Pixel sharp and crafted with care.


Although you - the Hivers - are responsible for the process, you will get the best support from the rest of the Humblebee staff. The Hive team have their desks right in the heart of the Humblebee office and every Hiver is assigned a personal mentor for the entire Hive journey. The mentors are all senior Humblebee staff, allocated to match your competence (service design, UX, dev, data scientist etc.).

**Practical stuff**

**The internship spans from January 27th to May 30th, and we aim to tailor the workload to align with your educational requirements.**


For example, we have had Hivers working 75% in the project and have 25% time for their thesis creation. In that way, they can write a master thesis based on the Hive project. This internship requires your presence at our office in Gothenburg for the first 2.5 months 3 times per week, and after that, it could involve a hybrid schedule. **Please note that this is an unpaid internship.**


We handle applications when they come in and are presently interviewing candidates, so apply soon to take up this unique opportunity. Humblebee is a multi-lingual company so please write your application in English. We're looking forward to your application!

**Want to know more?**


Have a look here: https://www.humblebee.se/hive

title: Senior Fullstack Developer - Cloud Solutions
description:
**Varför vill du ha det här jobbet?**

  

För att du gillar tanken på att arbeta som ett produktbolag samtidigt som du vill ha variationen som kommer med att vara konsult. Det handlar om att leverera produkter och tjänster som ett team. Kärnan i vardagen är kunskapsdelning. All kod granskas, snabba beslutsvägar och stor frihet ger dig möjligheten att utveckla dina färdigheter. Teamet är självstyrande, så hur problemet löses är upp till dig. Du och ditt team väljer teknologierna som behövs för att lösa uppgiften, inte tvärtom. I slutändan handlar det om att vi vill ge dig möjligheten att fokusera på det du älskar mest – att lösa tekniska problem.

**Bygg en karriär du kan vara stolt över**


Alla projekt, oavsett om det handlar om självkörande fordon, medicintekniska lösningar för att bekämpa cancer, eller en streamingtjänst, har en sak gemensamt: de är alla molnbaserade lösningar och produkter. Mob programming, kodgranskning, tech talks, hackathons och certifieringar är några av de sätt vi kan bli ännu bättre tillsammans. Det är vad det handlar om – att uppnå saker tillsammans. Du är omgiven av människor som bryr sig. Inte bara om projektet och teknologin, utan också om varandra. Vi gör det som ett team, och det är så vi tar oss framåt.

**Arbetsuppgifter:**

* Designa och optimera backend-lösningar med fokus på molntjänster inom AWS.
* Implementera microservices för att säkerställa skalbara och effektiva system.
* Designa och implementera RESTful eller GraphQL API.
* Arbeta med både frontend (React/Angular) och backend (Java) för fullstack-lösningar.
* Samarbeta med data engineers för att skapa integrerade och dataintensiva system.
* Arbeta med DevOps-principer för att skapa effektiva CI/CD-pipelines.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad om de senaste teknologierna och bidra till tekniska strategier inom AWS-arkitektur.

**Kvalifikationer:**

* Examen i datavetenskap eller liknande område.
* Flera års erfarenhet av utveckling och arkitektur inom AWS, med fokus på DevOps och fullstack.
* Starka kunskaper inom backend-utveckling, främst i Java.
* Erfarenhet av containerteknologier som Docker och Kubernetes.
* Gedigen erfarenhet av CI/CD-processer och verktyg.
* Kunskap inom frontend-utveckling med React eller Angular.
* Starka kommunikativa färdigheter och vana att arbeta i agila team.
* Flytande i svenska och engelska.

**Vad vi erbjuder**


På Knightec får du arbeta i en innovativ och stödjande miljö med projekt som gör skillnad. Vi värderar mångfald och samarbete och tror på att utveckla både produkter och människor. Med över 40 olika nationaliteter och en hybrid arbetsmodell som främjar flexibilitet, erbjuder vi en dynamisk arbetsplats med balans mellan arbete och privatliv. Här får du möjligheten att växa både personligen och professionellt, med stöd från vårt team och genom spännande projekt för ledande företag.

**En spännande resa med Knightec Group**


Vi på Knightec går nu samman med vårt systerbolag Semcon och bildar **Knightec Group**. Tillsammans blir vi den ledande aktören i norra Europa inom produkt- och digital tjänsteutveckling – hur häftigt är inte det? Vårt gemensamma erbjudande blir både bredare och djupare, vilket gör att vi kan ta oss an stora, strategiska kundprojekt på högsta nivå av innovation och komplexitet. För våra medarbetare innebär detta fantastiska möjligheter till kompetensutveckling och karriärvägar. Låter detta som platsen för dig? Häng med oss på denna spännande resa!

title: Strategisk fullstack-utvecklare
description:
Roy är en digitalbyrå som ingår i mediekoncernen Another Media Group. Vi expanderar vårt digitala team och söker nu en utvecklare som vill vara med och kombinera strategi, design och teknik för att utveckla produkter som hjälper våra kunder att förverkliga sina digitala ambitioner.


Här på Roy sätter vi människan i fokus, på riktigt. Det kanske låter klyschigt, men vi menar det verkligen. För oss är det viktigt att du mår bra på din arbetsplats och tycker det är kul att gå till jobbet.

 **Kort om tjänsten**  

Som utvecklare hos oss kommer du att utveckla webbplatser, nyhetssidor och andra digitala lösningar som skapar värde för våra kunder. Vi bygger gärna i Wordpress, ibland i headless och andra gånger helt utan CMS. Vi söker någon som är bekväm att ta sig an en bredd av projekt och har förståelse för såväl front-end som back-end. Idag är vi ett mindre team så det finns stora möjligheter att vara med och påverka t.ex. tekniska val och hur vi jobbar med våra projekt. För den rätta kandidaten finns det även möjligheter att ta mer ansvar på sikt och bli tekniskt ansvarig på bolaget.


Rollen kommer att ansvara för att bistå våra befintliga kunders vidareutveckling, hantering av support samt samarbete med externa konsulter i vissa projekt. Här får man både stort ansvar samt arbeta med många kontaktytor.


I den här rollen kommer du arbeta med flera av bolagen inom Another Media Group och våra gemensamma kunder.

 **Vem är du?**  

Vi söker dig som har minst 3 års erfarenhet som fullstack-utvecklare och som har en brinnande passion för att skapa snygga, snabba och moderna digitala lösningar. Du kan Wordpress och PHP och har kunskap inom Javascript och React/Next.js. Som utvecklare är du noggrann i ditt arbete och du översätter med lätthet en designskiss till snygg och funktionell kod. Våra projekt involverar ofta API-kopplingar, integrationer och uppsättningar av betallösningar så detta är något du är bekväm med att hantera.


På Roy strävar vi ständigt efter att utvecklas och bli bättre, både som individer och som team. För oss är hur du är som person viktigare än vad som står i ditt CV. Du kanske inte kan allt vi nämner här, men om du är nyfiken, orädd för att testa nytt och har ett genuint driv att utvecklas i din yrkesroll som utvecklare, då är du personen vi söker!

 **Vad du kommer att få göra:**

* Utveckla webbplatser och digitala produkter med varierande krav på funktionalitet och teknik
* Genomföra tekniska förstudier och bidra med teknisk kompetens i designprocesser och på kundmöten
* Sätta tidsestimat och planera projekt tillsammans med din projektledare
* Strategiskt hjälpa våra kunder och vårt team att nå bättre resultat och hjälpa till på den digitala resan

 **Tekniker du kommer att jobba med:**

* PHP
* CSS / SASS, Styled Components, Tailwind
* React
* Next.js
* Node.js
* REST och GraphQL Apier
* Git & versionshantering
* Headless CMS

 **För att lyckas i rollen tror vi att du har:**

  

* Minst 2-3 års erfarenhet som fullstack-utvecklare
* En ständig vilja att vässa dina kunskaper och utforska morgondagens tekniker för att utvecklas i din roll
* Goda kunskaper inom JavaScript och förståelse för moderna ramverk som React och Node.js
* Goda kunskaper inom PHP / WordPress
* Förmåga att förstå och översätta användarkrav och affärskrav till funktionell kod
* Bra förståelse för hur man bygger webbplatser som har bra prestanda
* Grundläggande kunskap för Teknisk / On-page SEO
* Hantering av domäner, webbhotell och DNS-poster

 **Vad vi erbjuder dig:**

* En konkurrenskraftig lön
* Schyssta förmåner , bl.a. tjänstepension och 3 600 kr i årlig friskvård
* Flexibla arbetstider med möjlighet att jobba remote
* En fullt utrustad MacBook Pro och iPhone med tillhörande abonnemang
* En bekväm arbetsplats på vårt sköna kontor vid Mariatorget i Stockholm eller Gustav Adolfs torg i Malmö
* Goda karriärmöjligheter i ett spännande och växande bolag
Drivna, snälla kollegor och fantastiska kunder!  
* 

  

Läs mer om oss och våra kunder på vår hemsida roy.agency

title: Baseband Developer
description:
**Grow with us**
----------------



We are currently seeking young and curious professionals with 2+ years of industry experience who want to be part of Radio Baseband software development for 5G and 6G.

  

About this opportunity:

  

When joining at Ericsson you are empowered to learn, lead, and perform at your best, shaping the future of technology. This is a place where you're welcomed as your own perfectly unique self, and celebrated for the skills, talent, and perspective you bring to the team.

  

Together with your team you will be responsible from pre-study to customer acceptance for new functionality, together with maintenance of current products. The team systemizes, designs and tests the software and takes joint responsibility for all team tasks.

  

What you will do:

  

Your focus will be in Physical layer (L1) parts of the Baseband SW, vital building blocks in our market leading 5G Radio Access Network (RAN) solution and in future within 6G. Together with your fellow baseband SW developers, you will:

* Build outstanding baseband software using C/C++, Python.
* Participate in the study, implementation, and verification of new 5G features and, in the near future, within 6G.
* Work in a multi-functional, multi-cultural environment with supportive teammates.
**Join our Team**
-----------------

  

We’re excited to see you bring some or all of the following:

* A Master of Science degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, Wireless Communication, Electrical or Electronic Engineering or equivalent.
* 2 - 5 years of industry experience preferably within telecom or similar industry working with embedded software development.
* Curiosity, a desire, and skills to be a great embedded software developer with a special interest in the C/C++ programming language for real time systems.
* Knowledge and experience in 5G and 4G wireless communication e.g. 3GPP specifications.
* Experience with signal processing, RF or air interface measurements, multi-core DSP processor programming in areal-time environment and design patterns in an embedded environment.
* A forward-thinking, hardworking, and creative personality. We love extraordinary teammates who enjoy a fast-paced work environment and adopts challenge.
* Dedication and a genuine interest in the latest technology trends and a passion to solve complex problems no one else has solved before.

  

You have an open mind and like to take on new challenges to continuously improve, and to work outside your own field to broaden your competence and get a deeper understanding of our products.

  

We will proceed with the applications as they come so leave you application soonest!


Why join Ericsson?

  

At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and creativity to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build never seen before solutions to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next. Ericsson is dedicated to fostering a diverse and inclusive environment, where everyone can thrive and bring their unique perspectives.

  

Primary country and city: Sweden (SE) || Lund
company_description: Do you want to be part of shaping the future? From making connectivity more accessible to the latest IoT solutions, you have an opportunity to be where it begins.

title: Software Developer
description:
**This is us**
--------------


Are you passionate about solving problems and delivering next-generation software to enhance the Internet experience? Join a global leader with over 20 years of experience creating software for fiber network operators. Are you looking for a place to see your ideas come to life in the real world?


Do you want to make a difference every day? Stop looking - at Netadmin; we offer countless personal and professional development possibilities. We provide a friendly, collaborative, and stimulating environment for learning and thriving. Read more about what it’s like working here.


**The job - what you’d be working on**
---------------------------------------


We seek an experienced and highly motivated Software Developer to join Netadmin’s product development team. As a Software Developer in Netadmin’s R&D department, you are part of a team implementing new product features. You will be encouraged to specialize in areas that you find challenging. We are working with the latest technologies, such as .NET 8 and Docker, in our development.

#### **Primary Responsibilities**

**Software Development**  

Implement new features in our products. The focus will be front-end development, but the work will include back-end development.


**Maintenance**  

Implement updates and/or changes to our existing code base.


### **Skills and competences**

##### **Ideal candidates will have the following experience, skills, knowledge, and personal characteristics:**

#### **Must have**

* Experience in .NET (C#) development.
* Experience in frontend development focusing on .NET (MVC) and TypeScript / JavaScript.
* Agile development.
* Solution-driven and structured.
* Team player with an outstanding ability to work with and through others.
* High energy.
* Quality is a point of honor.
* High curiosity and ability to investigate and learn new domains and technologies.
* Swedish and English languages (verbal and written communication).

#### **Meritorious**

* Linux experience.
* Experience in JavaScript development.
* Experience in MySQL.
* Network engineering experience.
* Containerization creation/maintaining experience.

**Who you are**
---------------


We're solving problems and delivering next-generation software we are proud of and passionate about customer success. So, for us, passion is non-negotiable. Our employees are experts in their field, passionate about what they do, and always looking for new and better ways to enable our customers to grow.


We're looking for enthusiastic and tenacious people who solve problems, see the world from the customers' perspective, and have the foresight of their problems. In short, they are committed to creating change in their work and for their customers.


We’re all about finding the right people for the proper roles and allowing them to contribute directly to our organization's success. You should have an inquiring mind and enjoy a challenge about personal attributes.

**What’s in it for you?**
-------------------------


At Netadmin, we prioritize continuous growth and learning. This involves taking on challenging projects, trying new things, and sharing knowledge with colleagues. We have been a hybrid-remote company for almost a decade, with team members in over 15 cities worldwide. We focus on innovation and provide the time, flexibility, and autonomy for you to excel in your career, whether working from home, the office, or a coffee shop.  

  

As a Netadmin, you can work on diverse tasks, leverage cutting-edge technology, and collaborate with talented professionals to develop software solutions. We encourage you to bring new ideas and build a long-term career.
  

  

Knowledge-sharing plays a vital role at Netadmin. We believe that by sharing knowledge and expertise, we are empowered to learn from one another, collaborate effectively, and drive innovation. It allows us to leverage our team's collective intelligence and continuously improve our solutions and services. Read what it’s like working here.

**Our global benefits**
-----------------------

### **Smooth everyday life**


We want our employees to be able to focus on what is important. That's why we offer various benefits, such as commuting assistance, healthy snacks, and breakfasts, to make their everyday lives easier and more convenient.

* **Hybrid works** - You have the flexibility to work from our office locations or remotely, allowing you to find the best environment that suits your needs and preferences.
* **Health services** - We offer comprehensive health and wellness services to all of our employees, including regular health examinations via OneLab.
* **Quality work environment—You can choose your preferred laptops and workstations, software, phone and** subscription, headphones, and other gear that are tailored to each person’s needs.
* **Share program and bonus** - When we succeed, all team members share the profits! We value long-term impact over quick wins and joined effort over individual contributions.
* **Health care allowance** - We provide you with a Health Care Allowance of 5000 Sek per year, which can be used for almost any health-related activities.
* ***Retreats*** - When it is possible, we make an effort to have face-to-face meetings for company gatherings. This gives us an opportunity to connect and bond with each other on a personal level.

**Grow with us**
----------------


Hi there! At Netadmin, we strongly believe in inclusivity and hire individuals based on their skills and abilities. If you feel the job description mentioned above aligns with your career aspirations, we would be delighted to hear from you!


At Netadmin, new Netadmins are not expected to conform to a particular mold – people are welcome to be themselves, regardless of their background. We think different perspectives are valuable and see diversity as a key factor in our success – so feel free to reach out to us, and let's embark on an amazing journey together!

### **Apply**


To apply, please submit your resume and a personal letter explaining why you find the role interesting and why you believe you would be a good fit. We will respond to you as soon as possible!

  

Please visit our website for more information about our product and company. To learn about our culture and future colleagues, visit our career portal. To learn about the interview process, learn more here.


We look forward to receiving your application. **Good luck from your future Netadmins!**

title: Business Intelligence Developer
description:
**BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE DEVELOPER**
===================================


**25 mars 2024**We are expanding our global team and looking for an experienced Business Intelligence Developer. Are you passionate about data-driven solutions and want to play a key role in developing our business? Keep reading!
### **POSITION OVERVIEW**



We are seeking a talented and motivated Business Intelligence Developer to join our dynamic team. As a Business Intelligence Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining robust BI solutions that enable data-driven decision-making across our global organization. You will work closely with stakeholders from various departments to understand business requirements, design efficient data models, and develop insightful dashboards and reports.


### **KEY RESPONSIBILITIES**


* Design, develop, and optimize data pipelines and ETL processes to extract, transform, and load data from various sources into our business intelligence environment.
* Build and maintain robust data models and data structures to support reporting, analytics, and business intelligence initiatives.
* Optimize BI solutions for performance and usability, ensuring data accuracy and integrity.
* Provide technical support and troubleshooting for BI applications and data-related issues.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
* Stay current with industry trends and best practices in business intelligence and data analytics.

### **REQUIREMENTS**


* Strong understanding of data warehousing concepts and hands-on experience in data modeling techniques specifically within the Microsoft Azure environment.
* Proficiency in SQL for data extraction, transformation, and loading processes.
* Experience with Power BI for data visualization and reporting.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and address data quality issues, discrepancies, or gaps.
* Understanding of business processes and requirements across different functional areas.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills with the ability to work effectively in a global, cross-functional team environment.
* Ability to create clear and concise documentation for BI solutions, reports, and dashboards.
* You are fluent in Swedish and English, both spoken and written.


We expect our employees to actively manage their own success. That means asking questions, sharing and expanding knowledge, interests and ideas and contributing to a constructive and kind work environment.


### **LOCATION**



Location is primarily Borlänge. The right skills are most important, and we can therefore also consider locations in Stockholm or Oslo.


### **YOUR APPLICATION**

  

  

We work with ongoing selection, so send your application as soon as possible.


### **QUESTIONS**



If you have additional questions about the position, please contact Martin Willén, Global Head of Business Control on +46 243 785 51 or Lars Vrennhage, HR Operations, on +46 8 704 80 39.


### **ABOUT SYMETRI**



At Symetri we create and provide technology solutions and services for design, engineering, construction and manufacturing businesses. We empower people to work smarter for a better future by ensuring they have access to the expertise and technology they need to improve their performance and sustainability.



We develop and distribute our own solutions and are one of the world’s top resellers of Autodesk software with over 400K users across Northern Europe and the US. Our mission is to challenge people to work smarter for a better future, and we value passion, teamwork, courage and the drive to create change above all else.

title: Frontend Developer
description:
*Is coding and creating seamless user experiences your passion? Our team is expanding, and we're on the lookout for a new team member who shares our vision of revolutionizing reality through smarter decisions.*

**About us:**  

Founded in 2009 with a mission to build the ultimate AI platform, Neovici empowers our customers to reduce costs, streamline workload and minimize their climate footprint through automated business decisions. We strive to help the world’s most innovative companies grow through solutions that are better for their business, their people and - ultimately - the planet.


**About the role:**  

As a Frontend Developer at Neovici, you'll be at the forefront of our mission to deliver a seamless user experience. Your responsibilities will include:

* Translating design concepts into clean, efficient and scalable code
* Collaborating with cross-functional teams to implement innovative solutions
* Optimizing applications for speed, responsiveness, and cross-browser compatibility
* Staying up-to-date with the latest trends, tools, and technologies in frontend development.
* Participating in code reviews and providing constructive feedback

 **To succeed in the role, you’ll need:**  

* 4-5 years of experience
* Fluency in Swedish and English
* Strong proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and Typescript
* Experience with modern frontend frameworks such as React Hooks, Haunted and Lit.
* Knowledge of responsive design principles
* Proficiency in RESTful API’s and asynchronous request handling
* Familiarity with Web Components, NPM and experience in legacy code migration (currently removing Polymer)

**Our Perks & Benefits**  

* Inclusive company culture
* Competitive salary, pension and comprehensive insurances
* Great office location in Gamla Stan (where your furry friend is welcome)
* Remote work options, including our international offices
* Professional development opportunities and continuous learning
* Cutting-edge technology stack and tools
* Generous vacation, health reimbursement and dedicated training hours

  

*Our commitment to well-being*  

We are proud to be a non-smoking organization, fostering a healthy and supportive environment for all our team members.**Seize this opportunity!** Apply today, as we'll close the job ad once we've discovered our candidate. Don't miss your chance to be part of something extraordinary. Your journey begins by submitting your application now.

 *We encourage applicants from all backgrounds to apply. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for everyone.*

title: Frontend Developer
description:
**⚡️ What We Do**
 Swiftly gaining ground as Sweden’s industry leader in battery storage and expanding rapidly in selected European markets, Flower is on a mission to enable the energy system of tomorrow.
   

  

 With an industry-leading AI-powered platform at its core, our service includes stabilizing the energy system by enhancing predictability and flexibility for both energy producers and consumers. By combining pioneering technology with a portfolio of flexible energy assets, we break new ground towards a fossil-free energy system, allowing clean energy to power society.
   

  

**🌟Who We Are**
 Tech company at heart – purpose in our DNA. Flower consists of a diverse group of innovative individuals with a strong desire to improve the state of the world.
   

  

 At Flower, we believe trust, collaboration and diversity are essential to not only create an inclusive work environment, but also drive career growth. By embracing varying perspectives, we allow creativity and progress to flourish.
   

  

 To accelerate towards our goal of becoming the pioneering force powering the energy system of tomorrow, we are now looking for a passionate and skilled Frontend Developer.
   

  

**👩‍💻 About The Role**
 The Partner Platform serves as our interface with our partners, offering insights into their flexible energy assets and illustrating their contributions to the energy system. As an early member of this newly formed squad, you will play a pivotal role in shaping both the product and our team’s culture and ways of working. Your contributions will significantly impact how our partners perceive Flower and our services.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Learn about the green energy transition and get a deep understanding of Flower’s offering
* Collaborate closely with the Product Designer, Product Owner, Full-stack developers and Data Engineer
* Develop and maintain the frontend of our web portal built in React, NestJS etc
* Realize new user flows and implement crisp designs from Figma
* Contribute to stable and scalable solutions
* Contribute in discussions about architecture, design and user needs
* Visualize complex data, showcasing Flower’s flexibility services to our Partners
* Work with new features connected to internationalization, diversification of our portfolio of assets (renewable energy production and storage) and new data streams


**Who You Are**
* You find it meaningful to contribute to Flower’s mission
* You have a degree in Computer Science or a related field, or equivalent documented experience
* You have at least four years of industry experience in web development
* You have experience of building system from scratch or early on
* You have strong frontend programming skills, specifically in React
* You are familiar with backend frameworks such as Nest.js, Spring, or Django
* You have experience building responsive web applications
* You have excellent problem-solving skills and mindset
* You have strong communication and collaboration abilities


**📍 Location**
 Our beautiful office is located in the heart of Södermalm just a short walk from the old town and Slussen subway stations. We value office collaboration but support hybrid work.
   

  

**✉️ Apply**
 To apply, please submit your resume and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and what you think you could bring to our team. Throughout the recruitment process you will meet with the
 **Talent Acquisition Specialist, Talent Acquisition Specialist, Developers from the team, Head of Partner Platform, and our CEO John.**
 Our corporate language is English, as we have over 20 nationalities in the office. We therefore appreciate it if you could submit your CV in English.
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

*We kindly but firmly decline any engagement in recruitment assistance for our hiring processes. This includes partnership offers or the sale of recruitment tools.*

 Swiftly gaining ground as Sweden’s industry leader in battery storage and expanding rapidly in selected European markets, Flower is on a mission to enable the energy system of tomorrow.
   

  

 With an industry-leading AI-powered platform at its core, our service includes stabilizing the energy system by enhancing predictability and flexibility for both energy producers and consumers.  To accelerate towards our goal of becoming the pioneering force powering the energy system of tomorrow, we are now looking for a passionate and skilled Fullstack Developer.

* Visualize complex data, showcasing Flower’s flexibility services to our Partners
* Work with new features connected to internationalization, diversification of our portfolio of assets and new data streams


**Who You Are**
* You find it meaningful to contribute to Flower’s mission
* You have a degree in Computer Science or a related field, or equivalent documented experience
* You have at least four years of industry experience in web development
* You have experience of building system from scratch or early on
* You have experience with a frontend framework like React, Vue, or Svelte
* You have experience with backend frameworks such as NestJS, Spring, or Django
* It is considered meriting if you have cloud experience at AWS Cloud Practitioner level or higher
* You have excellent problem-solving skills and mindset
* You have strong communication and collaboration abilities


**📍 Location**
 Our beautiful office is located in the heart of Södermalm just a short walk from the old town and Slussen subway stations. We value office collaboration but support hybrid work.
   

  

**✉️ Apply**
 To apply, please submit your resume and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and what you think you could bring to our team. Throughout the recruitment process you will meet with the
 **Talent Acquisition Specialist, Developers from the team, Head of Partner Platform, and our CEO John.**
 Our corporate language is English, as we have over 20 nationalities in the office. We therefore appreciate it if you could submit your CV in English.
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

*We kindly but firmly decline any engagement in recruitment assistance for our hiring processes. This includes partnership offers or the sale of recruitment tools.*

title: Software Developer (Consultant, Graduate)
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Technology, Information and Internet, and Software Development
description:
**Come work with us** 




 Netlight strives to be a truly diverse, equitable and inclusive organization. Regardless of who you are, what personality, background, and experience you have, you enrich our culture through your values. Netlight’s purpose is to unleash full potential, realize great careers, and fulfill personal growth. To achieve this, we have a highly engaged network organization, where every employee gets a mentor, delivery coach and personal communities. The key to our continued success is trust and personal responsibility, diverse experiences, challenging opportunities and developing from personal values. Every Netlighter is an active part of building and shaping this culture, which leads to a clear correlation between personal growth and the growth of Netlight.
 



  





**About us** 




 Netlight provides a full range of premium IT-consulting services at the forefront of the digital industry and stands out for its product- and technology-independent expertise in a wide range of industries and clients. We are a network organization of more than 2 000 role models making aspiring digital leaders successful in their business-critical IT projects. Netlight has been awarded several times as top employer, as well as for growth, continued profitability and engagement for diversity, equity and equality within the IT industry. Today we are growing all across Europe, currently with more than 10 active international offices.
 



  





**What does it mean to be an IT Consultant in Software Development at Netlight?** 




 It will vary a lot between Netlighters as we, around the right person, will design a role together with you. You will be starting somewhere familiar and build from there. Our focus is working with new technologies and building new products and thus, many different technologies, frameworks, methods are available to learn. It is your call how your career at Netlight will look, ranging from which clients you will work with, what role you want to take (based on your personal experience, strengths, your personal interest) and how your relationship with your mentor/coach/EDGE networks/social networks will look like.
 



  





 As a consultant at Netlight, you will build the products, systems and technical solutions of today and tomorrow. This means that our consultants get the opportunity to help build and scale existing and new products and companies and also continuously learn and master a variety of technical tools. At Netlight, we will challenge you. Our clients will challenge you. You will challenge our clients. You will challenge us. We will grow together and unleash the potential in each other.
 



  





 Our projects are in the fields such as Fullstack, Backend, Frontend, Web Development, System Development, Cloud, Mobile Development, Architecture, Business Intelligence, Data Engineering, Data Science, DevOps, Infrastructure, Cyber Security, Scrum Master, Agile Coaching, Product Owner, UX-/UI-/Interaction Design and more.
 



  





**Minimum Qualifications** 



* Master Degree in Engineering
* Verbal and written fluency in English
* Work and project experience related to IT



  





**Preferred Qualifications** 



* Proven Track-record from previous positions (e.g. recognized achievements & deliveries)
* Advanced/Bilingual (B2-C2) Swedish/Norwegian/Danish



  





**Next step?** 




 We are always looking for new Netlighters, so feel free to apply if you meet the qualifications.
 



  





 We will get in touch within two weeks if we find that your profile and experiences are a match beyond the qualifications at this time.

title: Frontend Developer
description:
*Natural Cycles° is a leading women’s health company that developed the world’s first birth control app, used by millions globally. We are a fast growing startup, and we promote an international working environment filled with smart and ambitious colleagues based in Stockholm, Geneva, New York, and remotely. Our mission is to pioneer women’s health through research and passion, empowering every woman with the knowledge she needs to take charge of her health.* 




  





 You’re a Frontend Developer who thrives in a fast-paced, data-driven, analytical and agile environment. Your soft skills shine and you can communicate with ease in English. You are passionate about technology, team work, but also have a responsibility and autonomy in your work. You are able to work efficiently in a remote work environment, in a setting where online and asynchronous communication is the foundation. You will be joining the Product team and working on the integration of the app with external temperature measuring devices.
 



  





**What you will be doing** 



* Ship top-quality, performant, accessible, inclusive user interfaces, features and products
* Work on the device integrations with the Natural Cycles core App (built as a Hybrid Web application, packaged for iOS and Android)
* Work in an agile team together with other software engineers, product manager, designers & testers
* Work in close collaboration with stakeholders across the organization to deliver top-quality user interfaces and features
* Work hands-on with data insights and analytics and if possible, always take the data driven approach
* Ensure continuous delivery of new releases while working in an agile way
* Maintain a healthy codebase



  





**What skills and experience we think you have** 



* Experience in frontend development: building websites, web applications, responsive layout
* Good understanding of modern CSS (e.g Flexbox, Grid), experience with modern pre/post-processors, such as SASS, PostCSS
* Experience with TypeScript and Angular framework (or ability to quickly learn)
* Experience working with git, github, pull requests, code review etc.



  





**Not required but it would be a bonus if you also have:** 



* Experience with native iOS (Swift) and/or Android (Kotlin) development, or app development in general
* Experience with building software that integrates with connected devices (via Bluetooth, API etc)
* Experience with Node.js backend development
* A passion for women’s health



  





**Our technology stack includes:** 



* TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js running on GCP AppEngine
* Ionic, Angular, Capacitor, React, Gatsby on the Frontend
* Firebase Hosting
* Highly automated CI pipelines (Github Actions)
* AppStore/GooglePlay releases on a biweekly basis
* We <3 Open Source, encourage Open Source contributions and often open our general-purpose repositories



  





**What we offer** 



* Flexible work arrangement - you will be part of a team based in and around Stockholm that values effective collaboration and transparent communication, irrespective of work location
* Professional development - you will collaborate with industry leading developers, promoting continuous growth and skill enhancement
* Modern technology - you will leverage innovative technologies and tools, within an environment that empowers you to contribute ideas and take ownership of your work
* Impactful projects - you will contribute to groundbreaking projects that redefine industry standards and create tangible value
* Commitment to quality - you will join a dynamic and progressive organization that prioritizes profitable, long-term product development



**Location** 




 We are remote-friendly, but we find great value in being able to connect with our teams in person. Most of the
 *product development* 
 team you will work with is located in Stockholm.
 



  





**Sounds interesting?** 




 If you want to be part of a successful team, we encourage you to apply for this position as soon as possible.
 



 We look forward to hearing from you!
 



  





**How to apply** 




 To apply, just upload your CV and answer the questions on the application form. Keep in mind that we can't accept applications through email because of GDPR, and only applications submitted via the career site (and in English) will be considered.
 



 At Natural Cycles we value diversity and inclusion because we know that teams with people from different backgrounds and experiences are stronger. We welcome candidates from all walks of life and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and candidates.

title: Frontend Developer - Consumer Experience team
description:
**About Us**
 In 2022, Instabee was founded after combining Budbee and Instabox - two leading last-mile delivery companies with three consumer-facing brands: Budbee, Instabox, and Porterbuddy. Instabee serves millions of consumers across Europe with convenient deliveries and is on track to become the leading European e-commerce enabler. Always with the consumer at heart.
   

  

 We’re fast, both in terms of parcel delivery and when it comes to growing our business. So far our journey has taken us from Sweden to the rest of Scandinavia and parts of continental Europe, but we have no plans on stopping anytime soon. As we continue to expand, the complexity of Instabee grows in parallel. With that in mind, we’re now looking for you to help us on the journey ahead.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We’re now looking for an experienced Frontend Developer who wants to work with some of Sweden's most downloaded apps. You will create impact by contributing to the development and maintenance of our consumer facing applications and services using modern tooling, creating a great user experience. With us you’ll be able to shape the future of our products that directly affect millions of users all over Europe.
   

  

**Your future team**
 The Consumer Experience team is responsible for creating a seamless delivery experience for our consumers across all consumer facing products. We want to do everything we can to understand our consumers and adapt to new market trends. By increasing transparency and improving flexibility during the delivery journey - we aim to create the world’s best delivery tracking platforms.
   

  

**What We're Looking For**
 We are looking for a senior engineer with at least 5 years of work experience - If you are a skilled problem solver who loves coding and making complex things work, then this is the place for you! We value individuals who are keen to learn, and your eagerness to develop your skill set will probably be your strongest asset when joining us. Beyond that we imagine that you have the following:
   

  

* At least 5 years of work experience as a Frontend Engineer in a modern tech environment
* Experience with JavaScript/TypeScript/React
* Experience working with Redux or other state management systems
* Worked on building and maintaining large-scale mobile and web apps
* Problem-solving skills and ability to think about sustainable and long-term solutions
* Experience in working with an agile development methodology
* Comfortable making decisions
* Proficient in English
* Based in Sweden (Stockholm)


**What You’ll Get**
 We can promise you that you will be challenged, develop your skills and have the opportunity to work with truly amazing and competent colleagues. If you like changes and want to set new processes and ways of working - this is the place for you!
   

  

**Benefits**
 Of course, we have all the necessary and standard benefits in place, but in addition to this, we can also offer:
   

  

 🌇 Sky-High Office: Modern and newly renovated with a 360-degree view around Stockholm.
   

  

 🐶 Puppy Friendly: Bring your dog to work - we've got a whole floor for our furry friends!
   

  

 🍸 Rooftop Fridays: Chill out at our Friday rooftop bar with the best views in town
   

  

 🥐 Wednesdays Tech Breakfasts: Fuel your midweek with tech talks and tasty bites.
   

  

 👾 Tech Demos: Dive into the latest innovations with our regular tech showcases.
   

  

 💻 Modern Tech Stack: Work with cutting-edge technology every day.
   

  

 🏓 Fun & Games: Ping pong, Shuffleboard, Foosball, and even a Karaoke Room for your leisure time.
   

  

 ⏰ Flexible Hours: Hybrid setup with working hours that adapt to your lifestyle.
   

  

 🎂 A Day Off on Your Birthday: We love to celebrate, so enjoy your birthday to the fullest with a day off each year!
   

  

 👶 Parental Pay for Six Months: Step away from work and provide the best care and love to your little one.
   

  

 Diversity and inclusion are very important to us and we are committed to creating an inclusive work environment. We want to be a workplace where everyone’s perspectives and opinions are valued, and we are dedicated to creating opportunities for all employees to thrive and reach their full potential.
   

  

*This recruitment process consists of background checks via Verifiera as a review of previous public criminal records. The result is public information that is handled confidentially. This is mandatory for all recruitment processes at Instabee (Instabox/Budbee) in Sweden.*
 Instabee was founded in 2022 after combining Budbee and Instabox - two leading last-mile delivery companies with three consumer-facing brands: Budbee, Instabox and Porterbuddy. Instabee is present in six countries, serving thousands of online merchants, including ASOS, Zalando, Inditex and H&M and is on track to become the most admired European e-commerce enabler.
   

  

 Since the start, Instabee has focused on consumer-centric and sustainable solutions, offering deliveries to boxes and homes using muscle power, electricity, renewable diesel and biofuels. Through bespoke technical solutions, Instabee can guarantee optimal fill rates and routing, minimising any unnecessary transports. Instabee is backed by Kinnevik, Creades and EQT, among others.

title: Developer Support Engineer for Data Calling
description:
**About Us**
 Sinch is a global leader in cloud communications, helping businesses connect with their customers on their mobile phones. We reach every phone on earth, with over 147 billion conversations every year. Our technology powers the world's leading communications platforms.
   

  

 Are you passionate about being the go-to resource for developer inquiries? Do you thrive on analysis, optimization, and clear communication? If so, we want you on our team! We're expanding our third-line support for our Voice, Video, and Verification products and are looking for someone who can help us become the best we can be. Are you ready for the challenge?
   

  

 We're strengthening our engineering team with a Developer Support Engineer who will serve as the bridge between our clients' developers and our internal team.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 As a Developer Support Engineer, you will be responsible for enhancing the developer experience by continuously improving our reference implementations, sample apps, and documentation, while providing top-notch support to our clients' developers. You'll troubleshoot customer integrations of our SDKs and APIs, track FAQs, and identify patterns that highlight potential SDK improvements. Our SDKs use WebRTC technology, making it easy to add real-time, in-app voice and video calling to our clients' websites or apps.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Handle and analyse third-line support inquiries to ensure our FAQs remain relevant.
* Help keep our developer documentation up-to-date and user-friendly.
* Build reference implementations and sample apps to simplify the integration of our voice, video, and verification SDKs.
* Collaborate closely with other engineers to stay informed about important updates and new releases.
* Focus on quality assurance and provide first-class support to developers.
* Communicate effectively with clients, ensuring their technical issues are resolved promptly and clearly.
* Conduct QA testing of SDKs on mobile devices to ensure optimal performance and usability.


**Requirements**
* Degree in IT, engineering, or a related field, or equivalent work experience.
* High proficiency in English, particularly in writing.
* Strong communication skills, with experience in handling customer support.
* Experience in app development or relevant development roles.
* Strong understanding of the development process and effective communication with developers.
* Interest in voice and video calling technologies.


**Good to have**
* Familiarity with Android and iOS application development (Kotlin, Swift).
* Experience of using tools such as Datadog and Kibana for monitoring systems and performing root cause analysis through detailed log and metric exploration.
* Previous experience in a similar support role.
* Experience with voice and video calling.
* Familiarity with WebRTC technology, IP networks or telecom networks.
* Experience in manual and automated QA testing of SDKs on mobile devices.
